lyrics.text:
Ko Sīsū ne hā’ele
Ki Saione ‘i mu’a;
‘O hiva ‘a e tamaiki
Hosana ki ‘Otua.
Na’e loto ke ta’ofi
He kau tisaipale;
Kae ‘ofa ai ‘a e ‘Eiki,
‘O malimali pē
Hosana!
Si’i Hako ‘o Tēvita ē!

‘Oku kei tokanga’i
‘E ia ‘a e fānau si’i,
Neongo ‘oku pule
‘I loto Hēvani.
Ko ia ke tau hiva
Hosana kia Ia,
He Tu’i Lāngilangi,
Mo hotau Kāinga.
Hosana!
Si’i Hako ‘o Tēvita ē!

He ka ne fakalongo,
Ka ne tau ta’ofia,
‘E hiva ‘e he maka
Ko hotau valokia.
Kae ‘oua na’a tau ngata
‘I he hosana lau,
Kae tuku hotau loto
Ke tauhi ki he Hau.
Hosana!
Si’i Hako ‘o Tevita
ē
!
